alert.note: Alert for Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:27PM EDT until July 14 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Macomb County in southeastern Michigan... Southeastern St. Clair County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 526 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Emmett to near Armada to near Almont, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Armada and Memphis around 535 PM EDT. Richmond around 550 PM EDT. New Baltimore around 615 PM EDT. Marine City around 630 PM EDT. Harsens Island around 640 PM EDT. Algonac around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Anchorville, New Haven, Adair, Columbus, Rattle Run, Pearl Beach, Ray Center, Chesterfield Township and Fair Haven. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
